mapper.select: SELECT id, code, short_code, name, price, short_name, corporation_code FROM stock

SELECT trade.stock_id as stockId , stock.code as code , stock.short_code as shortCode , stock.name as name , stock.short_name as shortName , MAX(trade.price) as stockHigh , MIN(trade.price) as stockLower , SUM(trade.count) as totalTrading , SUM(trade.total_price) as totalAmount FROM stock stock INNER JOIN trade trade ON stock.id = trade.stock_id WHERE trade.tradetime = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND trade.status = 'SUCCESS' GROUP BY trade.tradetime , trade.status , trade.stock_id , stock.code , stock.short_code , stock.name , stock.short_name
